headerDisplay: Wyze plug-in for Homebridge. This is a custom component to allow control of various Wyze devices using the unofficial API. Please note this mimics the Wyze app and therefore access may be cut off at anytime.
footerDisplay: For documentation please see GitHub repository

name.title: Plugin Name
name.description: This name will appear in your Homebridge log

username.title: Username (E-Mail Address)
username.description: The e-mail address used for your Wyze account

password.title: Password
password.description: The password used for your Wyze account

refreshInterval.title: Refresh Interval
refreshInterval.description: Specify the number of milliseconds to wait between updates, default is 60000 ms (60 seconds)

mfaCode.title: One-time Password (for two-factor authentication)
mfaCode.description: Only required for initial login if you have two-factor authentication enabled on your Wyze account

smsCode.title: One-time Password (for two-factor authentication)
smsCode.description: Only required for initial login if you have two-factor authentication enabled on your Wyze account
